description: Number of self-dual equivalence classes switching functions of exactly n+1 variables.
references: S. Muroga, Threshold Logic and Its Applications. Wiley, NY, 1971, p. 38, Table 2.3.2. - Row 22.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
I. Toda, On the number of types of self-dual logical functions, IEEE Trans. Electron. Comput., 11 (1962), 282-284.
